seq.cmd: audio.PlaySound('explode',0.3); var tar = this.getTarget(); var reimusp1 = new("org.tjuscs.bulletgame.model.player.ReimuSp",'reimu_sp_ef' ,this.getX()+64*MathUtils:cosDeg(90+(i-0.5)*22.5) ,this.getY()+64*MathUtils:sinDeg(90+(i-0.5)*22.5) ,5,90+(i-0.5)*22.5,tar,1000,10); game.getObjList().add(reimusp1); var reimusp2 = new("org.tjuscs.bulletgame.model.player.ReimuSp",'reimu_sp_ef' ,this.getX()+64*MathUtils:cosDeg(90-(i-0.5)*22.5) ,this.getY()+64*MathUtils:sinDeg(90-(i-0.5)*22.5) ,5,90-(i-0.5)*22.5,tar,1000,10); game.getObjList().add(reimusp2);
